result.reason: Implement bookmarking and enhanced URL management features for the integrated browser component.
result.approach: Add menu items for bookmarking the current page and managing bookmarks. Implement new configuration classes to store bookmark data, along with serializers for persistence. Create new UI components to display and interact with these bookmarks within the integrated browser functionality.
